summary: Frontend-only testing of new HR Attendance Input and HR Leave Input pages - All features working correctly. Both pages accessible via navigation, all UI elements functional, dialogs working as expected.

details: HR Leave Input navigation item visible under HR section
HR Attendance Input navigation item visible under HR section
Both navigation items use data-testid attributes
Navigation properly routes to respective pages
Attendance Policy section shows: Working Days, Non-Consulting hours, Consulting hours, Grace Period
Bulk Mark Attendance section with Present/Absent buttons
Employee Attendance Summary table shows 16 employees
Table columns: Employee, Department, Present, Absent, Half Day, WFH, Leaves
Validation Results section appears after validation
Shows summary: Total Employees, Clean (No Penalty), Penalty Pending, Total Penalties
Toast notification displays: 'Validation complete: 16 clean, 0 with penalties'
Apply Penalties button would appear if penalties exist
Summary cards: Pending Requests (4), Approved (3), Rejected (0), Total Employees (16)
Leave Requests table with columns: Employee, Leave Type, Duration, Days, Reason, Status, Actions
Apply Leave for Employee button (data-testid='apply-leave-btn') opens dialog
Leave Type dropdown (Casual Leave, Sick Leave, Earned Leave)
Start Date and End Date input fields
Bulk Credit Leaves button (data-testid='credit-leaves-btn') opens dialog
Leave Type dropdown (Casual Leave, Sick Leave, Earned Leave)
Info text: 'This will update leave balance for all active employees.'

critical_code_review_comments: GOOD: Both pages have proper data-testid attributes for testing
GOOD: UI uses consistent dark theme with proper contrast
GOOD: All interactive buttons have appropriate hover states
GOOD: Status badges use appropriate color coding (yellow=pending, green=approved, red=rejected)
GOOD: Forms include proper validation indicators (*) for required fields
GOOD: Dialogs close properly with Cancel button
context_for_next_testing_agent: HR Attendance Input (/hr-attendance-input) and HR Leave Input (/hr-leave-input) pages are fully functional. Both accessible from sidebar under HR section. Auto-validate shows validation results with summary stats. Apply Leave dialog and Bulk Credit Leaves dialog both work correctly.
